title: Jolts
description:
Paul Peglar, Emerson Dameron, and Amy Brooks share stories about wishing for kisses, a convoluted robbery, and the scars of a family loss.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Tenderlonious, Emerson Dameron, Afro Celt Sound System, Hozier, Robert Fullum, Kevin Allison, Paul Peglar, Amy Brooks)
